title: Footsteps Forever :  Pack2
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE



“Dear Game Developers, our team is ready with the next pack of our FOOTSTEPS FOREVER series.”


Introducing FOOTSTEPS FOREVER : PACK 2


If you’ve been enjoying our FOOTSTEPS FOREVER pack, you’re going to find this new addition just as impressive. By combining the utility of both packs, you’ll likely have all your daily footsteps sound requirements covered. Each sound in this pack is completely unique in texture and tonality compared to our previous release, offering something extra and special. While the former pack featured a more epic-adventurous gaming tonality, this new pack is tailored to meet your immediate needs for RPGs.


Each foley sound effect in this pack has been crafted using industry-leading foley creation tools and further polished in our go-to DAW.



Foley's details are provided below in the features section.

Only product thumbnail is CreatedWithAI
technicalDetails:
Features: 


Following are the categorized folder names:

Clean_Surface

Dirty-Surface

Gravels

Hollow_Wooden

Road-Concret

Sands


Number of Audio Waves: 768

Number of Audio Cues: 768

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1 KHz 16 Bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 5:42

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
